item.description:
Bluntly put, the Recession affects atheists too! Libertalia Autonomous Space on Broadway in Providence is a not-for-profit resource open to various alternative meeting groups, including the Providence branch of the IWW, an alternative literature lending library (Fertilizer Lending Library), and a children's day care. This is a great group of people with some very admirable secular causes that I think my fellow Freethinkers in RI might want to learn about while joining in a communal meal.

 

NOTE: Libertalia Autonomous Space is a drug/alcohol-free space, no BYOBs.
item.name: Anti-Holiday Party Potluck
